txt.en: Although Edash discovered a cure for the Orkish poisons used by Azog and his clan, it has proven difficult to maintain a supply of twistbeard.
Deliver the twistbeard to Thorin at Amdân
'Ah, let us hope this will suffice!\n\n'You have my thanks.'
Thorin can be found at Amdân.\n\nYou have collected a great deal of twistbeard and should now deliver it to Thorin.
Twistbeard can found on rocks in Azanulbizar.\n\nThorin has asked you to gather twistbeard for the Dwarves of the Haban'akkâ.

'As you know, Edash has devised a clever cure for the Orkish poisons used by Azog's kin. However, his supply has again run short.

'You are familiar with twistbeard, yes? Gather as much as you can find in the dale, bring it to me, and I will see that Edash receives it at once!

'Be swift, my friend. Several of our warriors are in dire need of the antidote!'
